articles.title: Injury report for tomorrow vs. Mavs: Luka remains OUT. Ayton is QUESTIONABLE
articles.original_title: Injury report for tomorrow vs. Mavs: Luka remains OUT. Ayton is QUESTIONABLE
articles.summary: Per McMenamin: Luka Doncic (hamstring strain) will not play against Dallas on Thursday, missing his fourth straight game, sources told ESPN. He is still progressing in his rehab and hopes to be able to make an appearance in Sunday’s All-Star game for the World Team, sources said.    submitted by    /u/CtrlAltDelightfull   [link]   [comments]

LeBron James, Austin Reaves and Marcus Smart are all not on the injury report so will be good to go after sitting out Tuesday’s […]

articles.title: Bedford scores 23 points in Virginia Tech's 76-66 victory over No. 20 Clemson
articles.original_title: Bedford scores 23 points in Virginia Tech's 76-66 victory over No. 20 Clemson
articles.summary: Jailen Bedford scored 23 points, Ben Hammond had 17 of his 19 points in the second half and Virginia Tech knocked No. 20 Clemson out of a first-place Atlantic Coast Conference tie with No. 4 Duke, beating the Tigers 76-66 on Wednesday night.  Bedford was the first-half spark with Hammond taking over after halftime as the Hokies (17-8, 6-6) snapped a two-game losing streak with their first win at Clemson since coach Mike Young's first season in 2019-20.

articles.title: Riley Makalusky, Kierra Wheeler set the pace and No. 19 West Virginia women rout UCF 106-56
articles.original_title: Riley Makalusky, Kierra Wheeler set the pace and No. 19 West Virginia women rout UCF 106-56
articles.summary: MORGANTOWN, W.Va. (AP) — Riley Makalusky scored 20 points in 20 minutes off the bench, Kierra Wheeler scored 18 points, and No. 19 West Virginia blew out UCF 106-56 on Wednesday night for the Mountaineers' fourth straight win.Makalusky, a junior forward, had her highest scoring game since she was a freshman playing for Butler. She made 7 of 10 shots overall, 3 of 4 3-pointers and went 3 for 3 at the free-throw line.Sydney Woodley scored 16 points off the bench, Jordan Harrison and Gia Cooke 12 e

articles.title: Thornton's 21 points lead Ohio State over USC 89-82
articles.original_title: Thornton's 21 points lead Ohio State over USC 89-82
articles.summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) — Bruce Thornton scored 21 points and hit two late throws to help Ohio State secure an 89-82 win over USC on Wednesday.Ohio State (16-6, 8-6 Big Ten) trailed 43-40 at halftime after opening 2 of 13 at the free-throw line, but Thornton steadied the Buckeyes in the second half. He became the fifth player in program history to reach 1,935 career points and moved into fifth all-time in Ohio State scoring.The Buckeyes grabbed their largest lead at 67-60 with eight minutes left aft

articles.title: Fudd leads the way as top-ranked UConn wins its 42nd consecutive game with blowout of Creighton
articles.original_title: Fudd leads the way as top-ranked UConn wins its 42nd consecutive game with blowout of Creighton
articles.summary: Azzi Fudd had 19 points, including three 3-pointers to become the 10th player in UConn history with 250 career 3s, and top-ranked Huskies cruised to a 94-44 win over Creighton on Wednesday night.  Allie Ziebell had 20 points and Sarah Strong finished with 16 as UConn (26-0, 15-0 Big East) won its 42nd consecutive game.  Ashlynn Shade and Kayleigh Heckel added 13 points each in the Huskies' 53rd consecutive Big East regular-season win.

articles.original_title: NBA bans Stewart, Bridges, 2 others for brawl
articles.summary: The NBA has suspended Detroit's Isaiah Stewart and Jalen Duren and Charlotte's Miles Bridges and Moussa Diabate for their roles in Monday's brawl.

articles.title: Doncic out vs. Mavs, hopes to appear in ASG
articles.original_title: Doncic out vs. Mavs, hopes to appear in ASG
articles.summary: Lakers star Luka Doncic will miss his fourth straight game Thursday against the Mavericks because of a hamstring strain. He hopes to make an appearance in Sunday's All-Star Game, sources told ESPN.
